articles.title: Courtney Rose's Resume
Courtney Rose's Course Project
articles.description: Welcome to my STA 518 Course website!
articles.contents:
Contents of this website
I have included the learning objectives for STA 518 and evidence that I have satisfied each objective under the Learning Objectives  tab.
I have included my course project, a resume made with {pagedown}, under the Course Project tab.
I have also included direct links to websites, videos, textbooks, and seminars that I have found helpful throughout my journey of learning R in the Resources tab.
Plan of Action
After this course, I hope to transform this website into more of a personal website for myself to use. I believe this would be a great demonstration of my skills on RStudio. It will also be convenient, because my resume is already attached and I havae links to my LinkedIn and GitHub page on the navigation bar.
